I have eaten several times in this place, and the food is very delicious.You need to try dinner in this place.I have eaten pizza, fried rice and fried chicken.All foods are delicious.The food and drinks here will make you miss this place (just like me).It is always a pleasant experience for me to visit this place and enjoying drinks.
